name: The Moon Channel
description:
Welcome to Idyllon Holdings! As manager of an aging apartment complex built by architect and techno-occultist Cyrano Geist, you're responsible for ensuring Idyllon's profits with this advanced smart home surveillance app.

How to win:

1. Maintain emotional distance from tenants
2. Report Code of Conduct violations
3. Beware the Moon Channel
4. Await the electric feast
